description.plain:
Perrie Louise Edwards (born July 10, 1993) is a pop singer, who is a member of the hit British girl band Little Mix alongside Leigh-Anne Pinnock, Jade Thirlwall and previously Jesy Nelson. They were formed during the 8th season of the television music competition ‘The X Factor’, and were the first band to win the show. They’ve since released six studio albums as a group, as well as a Greatest Hits. One of their most well-known hits is “Shout Out to My Ex” which contains a lot of references to Perrie’s ex-fiancée, Zayn Malik.

In 2021, after eleven years of being together, the trio made the collective decision of going into a hiatus to pursue individual endevours.

body.plain:
Perrie Louise Edwards (born July 10, 1993) is a pop singer, who is a member of the hit British girl band Little Mix alongside Leigh-Anne Pinnock, Jade Thirlwall and previously Jesy Nelson. They were formed during the 8th season of the television music competition ‘The X Factor’, and were the first band to win the show. They’ve since released six studio albums as a group, as well as a Greatest Hits. One of their most well-known hits is “Shout Out to My Ex” which contains a lot of references to Perrie’s ex-fiancée, Zayn Malik.

In 2021, after eleven years of being together, the trio made the collective decision of going into a hiatus to pursue individual endevours.

songs.title: Forget About Us

description.plain:
“Forget About Us” is an uptempo, Pop-Rock influenced track about reminiscing a past relationship and the desire to hold onto the good memories. The song is Perrie’s debut solo single after eleven years of being part of the UK’s biggest girl group, Little Mix, which went into a hiatus in 2022. The track is also the lead single for her upcoming debut album.

The teasing for the record started in early 2024. In February, Perrie released “Intro”, a forty-second song which features snippets of some of her album tracks, including “Forget About Us”. It produced by 1204, as a nod to the releasing date for the single. A month later, a longer snippet was uploaded to TikTok and the cover art was reveiled. Fast foward to the ending week of March, Perrie finally announced the date.

Here's the truth of it

Listenin' to songs that made you think about mе

No, I never gave it back, but

Do you remember the way we fell, and
Like everything froze with just one glance, then

songs.full_title: You Go Your Way by Perrie
songs.title: You Go Your Way

description.plain:
“You Go Your Way” is the third solo single by Perrie after the group Little Mix announced its hiatus.

On Sept 16, she posted a mysterious teaser on her social media, along with an instrumental in the back. 4 days after that, she released the pre-save of the song along with an official snippet of it and the cover art. The song and video were released on October 4th.

songs.title: Tears

description.plain:
“Tears” is the second solo single by Perrie, member of Little Mix. The English singer started promoting the song by posting a pre-save link with the title of “I Don’t Even Care Anymore”, a reference to the lyrics in the chorus of the song.

On June 7, she posted on her social media accounts the official cover art for the song and a snippet of it. She performed the song at Capital Summertime Ball on June 16, days before it’s official release.

songs.lyrics:

[Pre-Chorus]

You should've been sorry then (Mm)
But you'll never see me cry again

[Chorus]
I don't even care anymore (Don't care no more)
You can keep the pain of it all (Can keep it all)
I know I'm never gettin' back all my tears from you
I ain't mad that you made 'em fall (You made 'em fall)
You can keep the weight of it all (The weight at all)

[Post-Chorus]
Oh, I don't, I don't, I don't want 'em back
That's all, that's all that I'll let you have
Hold on to them 'cause that was the last
Of all my tears from you

[Verse 2]
You could spill 'em on the floor, they're yours
So do what you want, babe
I've been better off without them

[Pre-Chorus]
'Cause I like me more now than I did back then
Just removed you from the situation
And you'll never see me cry again

[Chorus]
I don't even care anymore (Don't care no more)
You can keep the pain of it all (Oh-ah, can keep it all)
I know I'm never gettin' back all my tears from you
I ain't mad that you made 'em fall (You made 'em fall)
You can keep the weight of it all (You can keep it, the weight at all)
I know I'm never gettin' back all my tears from you, yeah (Never gettin' back all my tears from you)

[Post-Chorus]
Oh, I don't, I don't, I don't want 'em back
That's all, that's all that I'll let you have
Hold on to them 'cause that was the last (Do-do, do-do)
Of all my tears from you
I don't, I don't, I don't want 'em back (My tears from you)
That's all, that's all that I'll let you have (My tears from you)
Hold on to them 'cause that was the last (My tears from you)

songs.title: Me, Myself & You

description.plain:
“Me, Myself & You” is featured as the B-side of the physical single for Perrie’s third release, “You Go Your Way”. The piano-led ballad conveys her thoughts and feelings about anxiety, offering comfort to those who struggle with it.

The song was released as a promotional single on November 8, 2024, accompanied by a live performance video.

The song was released as a promotional single on November 8, 2024, accompanied by a live performance video.

songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
You're the darkest part of me
The reason why it's hard to breathe
Stealin' words before I speak, mm-mm
You love to show up unannounced
Take my head up to the clouds
Then you're the one to talk me down
And back again

[Pre-Chorus]
I keep runnin' in circles, there's never an end
Why does it hurt if it's all in my head?

[Chorus]
It's always been me, myself and you
A piece of me that I don't get to choose
You're in every lonely night
I can't get you off my mind
It's always been mе, myself and you
No matter how I try to cut you loose
You'rе always holdin' on too tight, I
I guess you're a part of me for life

[Verse 2]
I can never pull away
Emotion in a tidal wave
You wrap my heart in heavy chains
And hold me down

[Pre-Chorus]
I keep runnin' in circles, will this ever end?
Why does it hurt if it's all in my head?

[Chorus]
It's always been me, myself and you
A piece of me that I don't get to choose
You're in every lonely night
I can't get you off my mind
It's always been me, myself and you
No matter how I try to cut you loose
You're always holdin' on too tight, I
I guess you're a part of me for life

[Outro]
Life, for life
Always gon' be me, myself and my
My mind, my mind

songs.title: Rollercoaster

description.plain:
“Rollercoaster” is a dance-pop anthem about committing to the ups and downs of love. It follows Perrie’s single “You Go Your Way.”

It was originally teased a year ago. On January 24, 2025, Perrie took to social media to make her fans choose between two snippets, “Woman In Love” and this song:

As Valentines day is approaching I thought I’d gift you one of my lovey dovey songs… I couldn’t decide which one so I thought I’d let you choose 💌

On February 5, 2025, the singer posted a thematic video with a pre-save link. Outlets such as The Grape Juice anticipated the release. Official Charts stated its vibe is a blend of Mariah Carey’s “Butterfly” and Whitney Houston’s “I’m Your Baby Tonight.”

songs.embed_content: Read “Rollercoaster” by Perrie on Genius
